body: Capstone group design projects in software engineering. SWENG 481 Software Design Projects (3) In this course students complete their group senior design project started in SWENG 480. Design groups meet regularly with a faculty advisor to report progress and resolve technical issues. Oral and written progress reports are expected at selected times. The class culminates with a final technical defense of the project.(Credits: 3)(Prerequisites: Prerequisite: SWENG480)(Additional Attributes: NONE)

title: SWENG 481: Software Engineering Project
